mapper.select: select * from wf_process_task t where t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.*, pd.name as process_define_name, pd.display_name as process_define_display_name, pi.variable as instance_variable, pi.create_time as instance_create_time FROM wf_process_task t LEFT JOIN wf_process_instance pi on t.process_instance_id=pi.id LEFT JOIN wf_process_define pd on pi.process_define_id=pd.id LEFT JOIN wf_process_task_actor pta ON t.id = pta.process_task_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
